text: Thad McClammy (October 22, 1942 â€“ August 21, 2021) was an American Democratic politician. He was born in Beatrice, Alabama. He was a member of the Alabama House of Representatives from 1994 until his death. McClammy died on August 21, 2021, in Atlanta, Georgia at age 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the Alabama Legislature Category:Politicians from Alabama Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Thad McClammy
